project.description:
The sample IB API acquired from decompiling tws-api-9.66.jar. I'm only including this source so I can get the travis ci build to pass.
When LINK can be resolved we can rely on the standard mvn dependency in central: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.interactivebrokers.tws/tws-api/9.72.05
The bleeding edge of tws-api is 9.72.x and can be acquired by downloading the sample code from link below and looking in IBJts/source/JavaClient which contains a pom.xml mentioned version=9.72.17-SNAPSHOT but the IBJts/API_VersionNum.txt mentioned API_Version=9.72.18 https://interactivebrokers.github.io/# (also reachable from: https://interactivebrokers.github.io/tws-api/introduction.html#requirements)
